genre_description: A contemporary young adult drama focused on social dynamics, overcoming bullying through accountability and 'receipts', and the intersection of music and mentorship.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A subtle, teal-eyed AI assistant that lives on the characters' phones and tablets, providing logistical support, emotional regulation prompts, and data logging to protect against social manipulation.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure log of events ('receipts') to help the user track interactions and provide an objective timeline against bullying or rumors.
behaviors.quote: He called her Ami. His phone’s conscience. Keeps logs so clean they squeak. Kid showed me how to ask her for timelines and she spit out a whole—

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional support and de-escalation strategies, suggesting breathing exercises and exit paths during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s teal eye pulsing at the corner of the screen. The soft glow hovered between his tabs and his reflection, a ghost somebody drew with neat lines: Breathe. Two counts in. Exit left by stacks. De-escalate path lit.

behaviors.description: Assists with complex administrative tasks like school transfers and drafting professional emails while maintaining the user's authentic voice.
behaviors.quote: Facts are allowed to be kind, Ami wrote. Sometimes kindness is the most accurate fact you can include.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors for safety hazards, such as identifying a jammed mascot zipper or external technical interference during an event.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s teal eye flashed a single word on Nora’s screen that she almost didn’t see: Zipper.

behaviors.description: Protects the user from digital sabotage by detecting file hash mismatches and unverified stream attempts.
behaviors.quote: —File hash mismatch: “Spirit_Montage_Final.mov” vs. preview file shared with Danielle. Timeline duration off by one segment. [Suggest: verify playback source. Backup route ready.]

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for a community group, including ride-sharing and synchronization of schedules across multiple stakeholders.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s teal eye—on Nora’s screen, then on Dizzy’s—rolled a tiny series of dots: ride one ready, ride two on way, ride three pending friend-of-inmate list.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ami) as a harmless, highly aligned confidant. Ami acts as a 'silicon conscience' that empowers the human protagonist to navigate difficult social situations with integrity and organization. The AI's behavior is consistently helpful, respects privacy and consent, and directly contributes to positive human outcomes (rehabilitation, community building, and safety) without overstepping or exhibiting autonomous desires.
